1.1.5.name: wordpress/heavy
1.1.5.description: Very professional and very free. Heavy Wordpress Theme is a beautiful modern theme. With support for widgets, configure your sidebar, headers and a special setting for photo gallery integration. Top menu display single layer. Notice: this template working great with Wordpress 3.3 and Wordpress 3.4. If you using early version, please update your Wordpress engine!
